compartments.constraint: Finders keepers, hopefully. Things you find may come from this pocket. (bottomless)
A shop? A tavern? An Inn? Coins and items go to and fro at such places. (bottomless)
Friend or foe? Trade partner or thief? Why choose? (bottomless)

A character's Strength score multiplied by 15 is the weight (in pounds) that they can carry. For each size category above Medium, double their carrying capacity. If they are tiny, halve these weights.
The weight of the haversack's contents do not change the weight of the haversack itself.
Holds 60 crossbow bolts, arrows, or similar.
Holds 6 long objects like bows, quarterstaffs, or spears.
The weight of the haversack's contents do not change the weight of the haversack itself.
Holds 5 sheets of parchment or 10 sheets of paper.
Holds any/all items that fit in the hole (6 feet in diameter, 10 feet deep).
Holds 20 sling bullets, 50 blowgun needles, or other small things.
Holds 5 sheets of parchment, or 10 sheets of paper.
